entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:35 a.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 7:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 3 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 5.5°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 8. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
